content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully established on the map. Although the agent repeatedly attempted to create a Lab at position (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs to ongoing research, all placement and crafting attempts failed. Other facilities (for example, the furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) and the copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)) were used for resource smelting but were not created as new map structures.

ERROR TIPS
• API Usage for Entity Retrieval
  – Avoid supplying unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or excess positional arguments when calling get_entities. Verify and adhere to its required signature before invocation.
  
• Lab Placement and Inventory Validation
  – Prior to attempting to place a Lab, ensure that the lab item exists in the inventory to avoid placement failures.
  
• Handling Null Returns from Entity Queries
  – When retrieving entities (such as labs), confirm that the returned value is a valid list rather than None to prevent iteration errors.
  
• Lab Crafting and Missing Ingredients
  – Confirm that the production chain for intermediary items (iron-gear-wheel, electronic-circuit, and copper-cable) is operational and that sufficient base resources (iron-plate, copper-plate) are available before attempting Lab crafting.
  – Address recurrent shortages (for instance, missing iron-gear-wheel quantities or insufficient copper-cable components) by proactively boosting production (via smelting or resource gathering) prior to reattempting crafting.
